definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: zhi2 xian4 xing4 jia1 su4 qi4

sentences.english: Both line managers and employees have the responsibility to promote a half-year review.
sentences.chinese: 直线经理和员工都有责任推动年中审核。

sentences.english: The straight-line pendula type bulk loading conveyor is a high-efficiency continuous conveying device.
sentences.chinese: 直线摆动或散货装船机是一种高效连续输送机械。

sentences.english: Their projective lines for denoting time are straight.
The nose must be clearly in front of the vertical.
sentences.chinese: 马鼻必须明显的在垂直线的前方。

sentences.english: The object model we use are three non- coplanar lines which intersect at two points.
sentences.chinese: 使用的物体模型为在空间交于两点的三条非共面直线。

sentences.english: Linear door handle and auto-return to open, humanistic design.
sentences.chinese: 直线式门拉手和开门自动回归，设计更具人性化。

sentences.english: Price is soaring. If it goes on like this, we shall not be able to keep the pot boiling.
sentences.chinese: 物价直线上升，这样子下去，我们都快要揭不开锅了。

sentences.english: The trees range with the front of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这些树与房子的正面在一条直线上。

sentences.english: Place your right toe in line with your left heel.
sentences.chinese: 把右脚趾与左脚跟排在一直线上。

sentences.english: In the Chinese chess, the chariot takes in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 在中国象棋里“车”沿直线吃子。

sentences.english: Depending on the size of the half- circles the straight connection varies in length.
sentences.chinese: 随半圆的大小不同，连接的直线长度也不同。

sentences.english: Over that time span, ambient noise levels went up.
sentences.chinese: 在这段时间内，环境噪声分贝直线上升。

sentences.english: A simple method for the estimation of the transverse shielding for intense- beam proton linac was described briefly.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了估算强流质子直线加速器横向屏蔽的方法。

sentences.english: Drogheda's profits soared out of all imagination.
sentences.chinese: 德罗达的利润正在以难以想象的速度直线上升。

sentences.english: You want to take this dive off the block as straight out as possible.
sentences.chinese: 跳离出发台时，身体要尽量成一条水平直线。

sentences.english: Microwaves that transmit television signals always travel in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 传输电视信号的微波以直线传播。

definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
